This modules implements pairs.

Imports

cell, fqdn, ../utils, ../private/assign

Types

Pair {.pure.} = enum
  RedRed = "r" & "r", RedGreen = "r" & "g", RedBlue = "r" & "b",
  RedYellow = "r" & "y", RedPurple = "r" & "p", GreenRed = "g" & "r",
  GreenGreen = "g" & "g", GreenBlue = "g" & "b", GreenYellow = "g" & "y",
  GreenPurple = "g" & "p", BlueRed = "b" & "r", BlueGreen = "b" & "g",
  BlueBlue = "b" & "b", BlueYellow = "b" & "y", BluePurple = "b" & "p",
  YellowRed = "y" & "r", YellowGreen = "y" & "g", YellowBlue = "y" & "b",
  YellowYellow = "y" & "y", YellowPurple = "y" & "p", PurpleRed = "p" & "r",
  PurpleGreen = "p" & "g", PurpleBlue = "p" & "b", PurpleYellow = "p" & "y",
  PurplePurple = "p" & "p"
The pair of two colored puyos. Source   Edit

func init(T: type Pair; pivot, rotor: Cell): T:type {.inline, noinit, ...raises: [].}
Note that the result is undefined if the pivot or rotor are not colored puyos. Source   Edit

    tags: [], forbids: [].}
Sets the pivot-puyo. If the colorPuyo is not color puyo, does nothing. Source   Edit

func swap(self: var Pair) {.inline, noinit, ...raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
